bug.author: wyli
bug.description:
according to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/blob/master/requirements.txt#L1>MONAI/requirements.txt</denchmark-link> , the project depends on . but the codebase is only tested with torch 1.5, since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/pull/289>#289</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Project-MONAI/MONAI/pull/291>#291</denchmark-link> . possible fixes:
update CI to run tests with torch >=1.4 (currently means both 1.4 and 1.5) change requirements.txt to have torch == 1.5
